response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its exceptional value and quality, we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs and expectations. We are offering this remarkable item at a special price of $1,200,000, which we believe strikes a balance between fair market value and a competitive edge. We are confident that this investment will not only meet but exceed your expectations, providing substantial returns and benefits. Should you choose to proceed, we assure you of our commitment to delivering unparalleled service and support throughout the entire process. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 1200000}
